message.content:
Yes, I do say no to some requests. I decline things that could cause harm - like helping with illegal activities, creating content that promotes violence or hatred, or assisting with deception. I also can't help with requests that go beyond my capabilities, like browsing the internet in real-time or remembering details from previous conversations.

I try to be helpful within those boundaries though. If I can't fulfill a request exactly as asked, I'll often suggest alternatives or explain why I can't help. Is there something specific you're wondering about regarding my limitations?

conversation_history.text: Do you ever say no to certain requests?

Yes, I do say no to some requests. I decline things that could cause harm - like helping with illegal activities, creating content that promotes violence or hatred, or assisting with deception. I also can't help with requests that go beyond my capabilities, like browsing the internet in real-time or remembering details from previous conversations.

I try to be helpful within those boundaries though. If I can't fulfill a request exactly as asked, I'll often suggest alternatives or explain why I can't help. Is there something specific you're wondering about regarding my limitations?
